sentence.Network_en: In almost all religions, the summum bonum can be attained only after death.
sentence.Network_cn: 在几乎所有的宗教中, 至善要在死亡后才能实现.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人在观察受造物的美与完满中，发现天主是「善」（Bonum）─在自己的创造物中显示自己是至高的善。同时也正是从这个对受造物 …
多默把“存在”（esse）跟“现实”（actualitas）“完全”（perfectum）和“善好”（bonum）当作全相一致。上帝既然存在，作为宇宙的元始 …

list.abs: 他们把生命的至善（summum bonum）变为一段快乐的时光，希望立刻达到一个目标，就是下一次的高潮。这个世界不喜欢哀恸的 …

auth_sentence.content: Unless that line about the magnum bonum potato was as dirty as some of us at the back of the class hoped.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unless that line about the magnum bonum potato was as dirty as some of us at the back of the class hoped.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unless that line about the magnum bonum potato was as dirty as some of us at the back of the class hoped.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
